data.meta_description: Is this your ancestor? Compare DNA and explore genealogy for Elijah Green born 1822 Stisted, Essex, England died 1888 Bradwell, Essex, England including ancestors + descendants + DNA connections + more in the free family tree community.
data.text:
Ancestors Descendants

Profile last modified 12 May 2022 | Created 19 Oct 2019

This page has been accessed 124 times.

Contents

1 Biography

2 Children

3 Census

4 Sources

Biography

Genealogically Defined

Elijah was born on the 13th May 1822[1] at Stisted, Essex, England[2][3][4][5] and was baptised on the 21st September 1841 at All Saints, Stisted, Essex, England, the son of William Green (labourer) and Maria Green of Stisted[1].

On the 19th October 1850, Elijah married Mary Ann Deadman at All Saints, Stisted, Essex, England. Elijah Green, bachelor, labourer of Stisted, son of William Green (labourer) and Mary Ann Deadman, spinster of Stisted, daughter of James Deadman (labourer). Witnessed by Thomas Partier & Elizabeth Deadman[6]

Elijah's wife Mary Ann died in 1856 and Elijah married Sophia Duncombe on the 4th April 1857 at St. Mary & All Saints, Rivenhall, Essex, England. Elijah Green, widower, labourer of Rivenhall, son of William Green (labourer) and Sophia Duncombe, spinster of Rivenhall, daughter of Charles Duncombe (labourer). Witnessed by John Galley and William Tame[7]

In 1888 Elijah was occupied as a labourer, employed by Mr. Henry Brunwin[8][9].

On Saturday 4th August[9] 1888[8], Elijah died as a result of an injury to his liver which he had sustained during a fall in the preceding February.

"BRADWELL-BY-BRAINTREE - DEATH FROM INJURY - On Saturday a man named Elijah Green, a labourer, in the employ of Mr. Henry Brunwin, died from injury to his liver caused by falling from a tumbrel which he was loading with straw in the month of February last. He has been attended by Dr. Taylor of Bocking. An Inquest is not considered necessary."[8]

Children

By Sophia Duncombe:

Alice Elizabeth Green b. 1859 at Rivenhall, Essex, England[3][4] bapt. 27th March 1859 at Rivenhall, Essex, England

Frederick Green b. abt. 1861[10] at Rivenhall, Essex, England[3][4]

Ann Sophia Green b. 4th March 1863[11] at Bradwell Juxta Coggeshall, Essex, England[4]

Ellen Green b. 1865[12] at Bradwell Juxta Coggeshall, Essex, England[4][5]

Harriet Green b. 1868[13] at Bradwell Juxta Coggeshall, Essex, England[4][5]

Harry Edgar Green b. 1871[14] d. 1871[15] at Bradwell Juxta Coggeshall, Essex, England
